unnormalised: ## Chai Pe Charcha: Bollywood Buzz That's Hotter Than Jalebi!
normalised: ## Chai Pe Charcha: Bollywood Buzz That's Hotter Than Jalebi!

unnormalised: Hey guys, grab your chai and samosas, because the gossip is SPILLING! Bollywood's been buzzing like a Mumbai local train at peak hour. And trust me, this is juicier than your aunty's secret biryani recipe!
normalised: Hey guys, grab your chai and samosas, because the gossip is SPILLING! Bollywood's been buzzing like a Mumbai local train at peak hour. And trust me, this is juicier than your aunty's secret biryani recipe!

unnormalised: First up, word on the street (aka Insta) is that Arjun Kapoor and Malaika Arora might FINALLY be tying the knot. Sources close to the *family* (you know how that goes!) are saying it's going to be a hush-hush affair in Goa. Think sunset beach vows and zero papz allowed… allegedly! We'll believe it when we see the haldi pics, though. Remember Priyanka and Nick's wedding? That was a whole festival in itself!

Sources close to the *family* (you know how that goes!) are saying it's going to be a hush-hush affair in Goa. Think sunset beach vows and zero papz allowed… allegedly! We'll believe it when we see the haldi pics, though. Remember Priyanka and Nick's wedding? That was a whole festival in itself!

unnormalised: Then there’s the whole debacle with Kriti Sanon and Prabhas. Remember the rumors swirling around Adipurush? Well, they've resurfaced! Apparently, their on-screen chemistry wasn't just acting. My cousin, who works at a movie theatre in Delhi (reliable source, guys, RELIABLE!), says he overheard someone saying they were spotted holding hands at an Onam celebration in Kerala last month. Hmmm... Spicy!

unnormalised: And can we talk about Ranbir Kapoor's new look? Dude shaved his beard! Social media is losing its mind. Some are saying it's for a new role, others are just saying he's finally embracing his inner *chikna*. Either way, the internet's burning with opinions, hotter than the Delhi summer!

unnormalised: Oh, and Ranveer Singh was spotted buying a new Rolls Royce! Apparently, it's a custom model painted in a shade of vibrant purple. Talk about making a statement! That thing probably costs more than my entire house in Navi Mumbai. Just saying!

unnormalised: So, that’s all the garam masala for now. Stay tuned for more Bollywood goss. Until then, keep sipping your chai and keep those rumors coming!
